title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: When performing 'copy package' in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui, the resulting project (xx) contains an unexpected package named 'ui'.
OB: When performing 'copy package', the resulting project (xx) contains a package named 'ui'.
EB: After performing 'copy package', the resulting project (xx) should not contain a package named 'ui'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 

1. Create a new project (xxx).
2. In the Package viewer, select a package in project A (e.g., from the context menu choose 'copy').
4. Perform the 'copy package' operation.
